segments.text: I don't know why people are just mad about David Peckham . Is there really anything so fascinating with him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He appeals to the fans thanks to two things
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you mean he plays well ? Yeah , he often scores by free kicks in crucial games . But a football match is by no means merely a show of taking free kicks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly not . What really counts is to play as a team , passing the ball amongst each other , dodging defenders . Free kicks are a result of all the teammates ' collective efforts . However , a few free k
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In the case , maybe facial charm should be his leading card . After all , the majority of his fans are girls .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , his face looks are manly , with a straight nose and infinite eyes . As a man of medium height in the West , he keeps a powerful but elegant figure , looking neither lanky nor stout .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: and he is English ! He makes a model gentleman when he puts on a black suit and speaks with a typical British accent .
segments.speaker: S1
